Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd Street/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
